Serialized Form

Package jhave

Class jhave.Algorithm extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

DescriptiveText

java.lang.String DescriptiveText
This is a line of text describing the algorithm.

AlgoName

java.lang.String AlgoName
This is a one word name of the algorithm. Two different algorithms should not have the same name.

Dynamic

boolean Dynamic
If true, the server generates its script file. If false, its script file is fixed.

May_Have_Friends

boolean May_Have_Friends
If true, this algorithm may share data with itself or other algorithms. If false, the server always creates a new script for it, or the script is fixed.

Always_Needs_Input_Generator

boolean Always_Needs_Input_Generator
If true and this algorithm requires an input generator, this means that the server should always send the imput generator. If false and this algorithm requires an input generator, this means that the server should only send the input generator when new data is choosen by the user.

VisualizerType

java.lang.String VisualizerType
This indicates the visualizer that can run the visualizations. i.e. Samba, Gaigs, JavaApp

AlgoFriendVect

java.util.Vector<E> AlgoFriendVect
This holds pointers to all the algorithms that may share data with this one.

Package jhave.core

Class jhave.core.OperationNotSupportedException extends java.lang.RuntimeException implements Serializable

Class jhave.event.AudioTextEvent extends java.util.EventObject implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

the_text_to_speak

java.lang.String the_text_to_speak
The text to be spoken. (A file if contains .au or .wav)

Serialized Fields

type

int type
The type of the event.

resource

java.net.URI resource
The documentation url.

Class jhave.event.NetworkEvent extends java.util.EventObject implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

transactionCode

int transactionCode
The transaction code.

message

java.lang.String message
The message received from the server.

hasTransactionCode

boolean hasTransactionCode
If the event has a transaction code.

hasAppendedTransaction

boolean hasAppendedTransaction
If an extra transaction was sent from the server.

appendedTransaction

java.lang.Object appendedTransaction
Object appended from a 2nd transaction

Class jhave.event.QuestionEvent extends java.util.EventObject implements Serializable

question

Question question
The question attached to this event.

Class jhave.event.QuizEvent extends java.util.EventObject implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

openQuestion

boolean openQuestion
If the event signals a shown dialog.
